instructions.name: general
instructions.value:
General Instructions:

  1. Total duration of examination is 60 minutes.
    सभी प्रश्नों को हल करने के लिए आपको 60 मिनट का समय दिया जाएगा।

  2. The clock will be set at the server. The countdown timer in the top mid of screen will display the remaining time will availabe for you to complete the examination. When timer reaches the zero, the examination will end by itself. You will not be required to end or submit your examination.
    सर्वर पर घड़ी लगाई गई है तथा आपकी स्क्रीन के दाहिने कोने में शीर्ष पर काउंटडाउन टाइमर में आपके लिए परीक्षा समाप्त करने के लिए शेष समय प्रदर्शित होगा। परीक्षा समय समाप्त होने पर, आपको अपनी परीक्षा बंद या जमा करने की जरूरत नहीं है । यह स्वतः बंद या जमा हो जाएगी।

  3. The Question Palette displayed on the right side of screen will show the status of each question using one of the following symbols:
    स्क्रीन के दाहिने कोने पर प्रश्न पैलेट, प्रत्येक प्रश्न के लिए निम्न में से कोई एक स्थिति प्रकट करता है:
    1. You have not visited the question yet.
      आप अभी तक प्रश्न पर नहीं गए हैं।
    2. You have not answered the question.
      आपने प्रश्न का उत्तर नहीं दिया है।
    3. You have answered the question.
      आप प्रश्न का उत्तर दे चुके हैं।
    4. The question(s) "Marked for Review" will be not be considered for evaluation. Hence, no marks will be allocated for the same.
      प्रश्न "समीक्षा के लिए चिह्नित" की जांच नहीं की जाएगी, इसलिए अंक आवंटित नहीं किए जाएंगे।

instructions.name: important
instructions.value:
Other Important Instructions

  1. You will be given 60 minutes to attempt these questions.

  2. 1/3rd mark will be deducted for every wrong answer.

  3. One question will be displayed on the screen at a time. You are requested to be aware of the amount of time you spend question. Do not spent too much time on any question.

  4. Each question will have 4 alternatives, out of which only one will be the correct answer.

  5. The Candidate can view the Question Paper in the language opted for, at the time of filling application and in English Language. in the case of any discrepancy between the English and other versions of a question, the English version will prevail.

  6. This is a Exam Test. The Question paper displayed is for practice purpose only. Under no circumstances should this be presumed as a sample paper.
instructions.footer: I have read and understand instructions. All computer hardware alloted to me are in proper working condition. I declare that I am not posssession of /not wearing /not carrying any prohibited gadget like mobile phone, blue tooth device etc./any prohibited material with me into the Examination Hall. I agree that in case of not adhering to the instructions, I shall be liable to debarred from this test and/or to disciplinary action, which may include ban from future tests / Examinations.
